Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Prevents outsourcing during a hiring freeze
Summary: Prevents an agency, department, division, commission, bureau or any other entity under the authority of the executive department from contracting, subcontracting or hiring any third party during a hiring freeze.
LawCode: Add ยง66, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to preventing outsourcing during a hiring freeze
